remarks: A subring always has the same division function, for elements that are invertible.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
statement:
subrgdv.1 $e |- S = ( R |`s A ) $.
subrgdv.2 $e |- ./ = ( /r ` R ) $.
subrgdv.3 $e |- U = ( Unit ` S ) $.
subrgdv.4 $e |- E = ( /r ` S ) $.
subrgdv $p |- ( ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ X e. A /\ Y e. U ) -> ( X ./ Y ) = ( X E Y ) ) $.
